label: logicC:finance_en
steps: [1] If the firm generates stable positive free cash flow, then it can comfortably service its interest payments.
[2] If the firm can comfortably service its interest payments, then it qualifies to refinance its debt at lower rates.
[3] If the firm qualifies to refinance at lower rates and market interest rates have fallen, then the firm's weighted average cost of capital decreases.
[5] The firm generates stable positive free cash flow.
[6] For every investor x, if x maintains a diversified portfolio, then x reduces unsystematic risk.
[7] Investor a maintains a diversified portfolio.
[8] For every investor x, if x reduces unsystematic risk, then x either achieves a steadier return profile or avoids large drawdowns.
[9] The firm can comfortably service its interest payments. (from [1] and [5])
[10] The firm qualifies to refinance its debt at lower rates. (from [2] and [9])
[11] The firm's weighted average cost of capital decreases. (from [3], [10], and [4])
[12] Investor a reduces unsystematic risk and either achieves a steadier return profile or avoids large drawdowns. (from [6], [7], [8])
